full_text:
HERMAN & MERMELSTEIN PA
ATTORNEYS AT LAW

Stuart S. Mermelstein
Tel 305-931-2200
Fax 305-931-0877
ssm@hermanlaw.com
18205 Biscayne Boulevard
Suite 2218
Miami, Florida 33160
www.hermanlaw.com

March 31, 2008

Via Federal Express
Honorable Sandra McSorley
Palm Beach County Courthouse
205 North Dixie Highway
Courtroom 11F
West Palm Beach, Florida 33401

Re: State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein
Case No.: 502006CF009454AXXXMB

Dear Judge McSorley:

We represent a witness in the above-referenced matter. It is kindly requested that a fifteen (15) minute or less special set hearing be scheduled on the enclosed Motion for Protective Order. Please have your judicial assistant contact my office to schedule said hearing.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Very truly yours,

Stuart S. Mermelstein

SSM/lr
cc: Jack Goldberger, Esq.
Lanna Leigh Belohlavek, Esq.

07/26/17 Page 36 of 114 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030389

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Stuart S. Mermelstein to Judge Sandra McSorley regarding a case involving Jeffrey Epstein. The letter is dated March 31, 2008, and is related to a public records request made on 07/26/17.
